txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Do not leave the southern entrance of Crithost unguarded</rgb>
Stand your ground and defend Crithost
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not leave the north-west entrance of Crithost unguarded</rgb>
Talk to Tolwin
Crithost is located in Talath Anor.\n\nYou should defend Crithost from the approaching scouting party at the south entrance.
'That was a close battle! Thankfully, we had those barricades and your expert fighting!\n\n'I hope that was only a scouting party and not the first wave of a larger assault upon this small village.'
The scouting party is now approaching the southern entrance to Crithost!
You have left Crithost unguarded
Tolwin can be found in the hall of Crithost.\n\nYou should speak with Tolwin.
Crithost is located in Talath Anor.\n\nYou should defend the southern entrance of Crithost.

'What is that shouting in the hall? A scouting party approaches?! Everyone, get those who can not defend inside the hall!\n\n'Quickly, [placeholder], we must defend the village of Crithost from these bands of Orcs and Easterlings!'
A scouting party of Easterlings and Orcs are en route to Crithost. Now is the time to defend the village from the enemy.
Do not let the scouting party invade Crithost
Crithost is located in Talath Anor.\n\nYou should defend the north-west entrance of Crithost.
Defend the southern entrance of Crithost
Defend the north-west entrance of Crithost
You have successfully defended Crithost!

Crithost is located in Talath Anor.\n\nYou should defend Crithost from the approaching scouting party at the north-west entrance.
